Characters#

For drafting your team of mercenaries to win the final battle against the opposing country, you need to know who you can hire. Here is the collection of characters available for hire. Look into them closely and draft the best team for VICTORY!!!

Class Types#

There are three (3) class types a character can be:

Class Type

Description

Attacker

Focuses on dealing damage

Healer

Focuses on healing the team/themselves

Tank

Focuses on taking hits and retaliating
